eu.mf2c.stfc.util

Class CertUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.mf2c.stfc.util.CertUtil

  • public class CertUtil
extends Object
    Miscellaneous utilities for working with X.509 certificates.

    author Shirley Crompton email shirley.crompton@stfc.ac.uk org Data Science and Technology Group, UKRI Science and Technology Council Created 11 Dec 2018

    • Method Detail

      • loadCert

        public static X509Certificate loadCert(String fileName)
        Helper method to load an X.509 certificate from file. The certificate needs to be in PEM format.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String representation of the file name
        Returns:
        the generated X509Certificate or null.

      • loadPrivateKey

        public static PrivateKey loadPrivateKey(String fileName)
        Load a PrivateKey from a PEM file.

        Parameters:
        fileName - String representation of the file name
        Returns:
        the generated PrivateKey or null.

      • loadCSR

        public static org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest loadCSR(String csrString)
                                                                throws IOException
        Generate a PKCS10CertificationRequest from a String representation
        Parameters:
        csrString - String representation
        Returns:
        the generated PKCS10CertificationRequest object
        Throws:
        IOException - if error reading the String

      • writeCertPEM2File

        public static void writeCertPEM2File(X509Certificate x509Cert,
                                     String fileName,
                                     CA ca)
                              throws Exception
        Write an X509certificate to file. The output file would be in PEM format.

        Parameters:
        x509Cert - the X509certificate to write
        fileName - the target file name
        ca - the issuing CA
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • writePrivateKey2File

        public static void writePrivateKey2File(PrivateKey privKey,
                                        String fileName,
                                        CA ca)
                                 throws Exception
        Write a PrivateKey out to file, the key is base64 encoded.

        Parameters:
        privKey - the PrivateKey
        fileName - String representation of the file name
        ca - the issuing CA
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • concateCredentials

        public static String concateCredentials(PrivateKey privKey,
                                        X509Certificate cert)
                                 throws IOException
        Write out the provided credential object/s to a String object. The PrivateKey object is optional.

        Parameters:
        privKey - a PrivateKey object or null
        cert - a X509certificate object
        Returns:
        a String representation of the credential/s
        Throws:
        IOException - on error

      • genKeyPair

        public static KeyPair genKeyPair()
        Generate an RSA KeyPair of 2048 length.

        *

        Returns:
        the generated KeyPair or null.

      • signCSR

        public static X509Certificate signCSR(org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest csr,
                                      CA ca)
                               throws Exception
        Wrapper method to sign a certification request and issue an end-entity X.509 Certificate. The following key usages and extended key usages are set:
        • dataEncipherment
        • digitalSignature
        • keyEncipherment
        • id_kp_clientAuth
        • id_kp_serverAuth

        Parameters:
        csr - the PKCS10CertificationRequest to sign
        ca - the issuing CA
        Returns:
        the generated X509certificate if successful
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • generateCertificate

        public static X509Certificate generateCertificate(String cn,
                                                  PublicKey subPK,
                                                  CA ca)
                                           throws Exception
        Wrapper method to get an end-entity X.509 Certificate.

        Parameters:
        cn - a String representation of the subject principle name
        subPK - PublicKey of the subject principal
        ca - the issuing CA
        Returns:
        the generated X509certificate if successful
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • generateCertificate

        public static X509Certificate generateCertificate(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500.X500Name subject,
                                                  PublicKey subPK,
                                                  CA ca)
                                           throws Exception
        Utility to generate an end-entity X.509 Certificate. The following key usages and extended key usages are set:
        • dataEncipherment
        • digitalSignature
        • keyEncipherment
        • id_kp_clientAuth
        • id_kp_serverAuth

        Parameters:
        subject - an X500Name of the subject principal
        subPK - PublicKey of the subject principal
        ca - the issuing CA
        Returns:
        the generated X509certificate if successful
        Throws:
        Exception - on error

      • spotCheckCert

        public static void spotCheckCert(X509Certificate cert)
        Utility to print out the following attributes in the X509certificate:
        • subject DN
        • issuer DN
        • basic constraint
        • basic constraint
        • key usages
        • extended key usages

        Parameters:
        cert - the X509certificate to check.

      • listCSRExtensions

        public static void listCSRExtensions(org.bouncycastle.asn1.pkcs.Attribute[] attrs)
        Utility to list the extension attributes in the Certification Request.

        Parameters:
        attrs - Array of attributes to list.

      • listExtension

        public static void listExtension(org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.Extensions exts)
        Utility to list the extended and key usages in an X.509 certificate.

        Parameters:
        exts - certificate Extensions object

      • getCSRString

        public static String getCSRString(org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest csr)
                           throws IOException
        Convert an PKCS10CertificationRequest object to String representation
        Parameters:
        csr - the PKCS10CertificationRequest object
        Returns:
        the converted String representation
        Throws:
        IOException - on error reading in the object
